abstract.shortdesc: Task titles define actions that are meaningful user objectives.

rule.rule-statement: Start titles with active verbs; never use gerunds.
rule.justification: Opinions vary on this rule. In the name of consistency, stick to the rule.

examplefig.codeblock: <title>Add a user</title> <title>Modify a user's profile</title> <title>Take a picture</title>
<title>Adding a user</title> <title>Modifying a user's profile</title> <title>Taking a picture</title>

rule.rule-statement: Write titles that are as short as possible, but that are long enough to differentiate similar tasks.

examplefig.codeblock: <title>Add a user</title> <title>Modify a user's profile</title> <title>Insert a picture in a document</title> <title>Insert a picture in a document template</title> <title>Take a picture</title> <title>Take a panoramic picture</title>
